IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: GIVING THE BASICS PROVIDES THE NECESSITIES OF LIFE, NOT COVERED BY GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS, SUCH AS LAUNDRY SOAP, SHAMPOO, DEODORANT, TOILET PAPER AND OTHER PERSONAL CARE HYGIENE PRODUCTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: GIVING THE BASICS PROVIDES THE NECESSITIES OF LIFE, NOT COVERED BY GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS, SUCH AS LAUNDRY SOAP, SHAMPOO, DEODORANT, TOILET PAPER AND OTHER PERSONAL CARE HYGIENE PRODUCTS.
IRS990.Desc: GIVING THE BASICS DISTRIBUTES, FREE OF CHARGE, PERSONAL CARE HYGIENE PRODUCTS TO 123 FOOD PANTRIES ABD HOMELESS SHELTERS, 364 SCHOOLS AND 14 POLICE DIVISIONS IN THE GREATER KANSAS CITY METRO AREA. PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTED INCLUDE CLEANING SUPPLIES, BRUSHES/COMBS, SHAMPOO, LOTION, DEODORANT, FEMININE HYGIENE PRODUCTS, LAUNDRY SOAP, TISSUES, SOAP, TOOTHBRUSHES, TOOTHPASTE, TOILET PAPER AND INCONTINENCE PRODUCTS. THESE ITEMS ARE NOT COVERED BY GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE AND ARE VITAL FOR BASIC HUMAN DIGNITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRIOR TO RECEIVING ASSISTANCE, ORGANIZATIONS MUST COMPLETE AN APPLICATION AND PROVIDE PROOF OF TAX EXEMPT/SECTION 501(C)(3) STATUS. THEY MUST PROVIDE DOCUMENTATION REGARDING INDIVIDUALS SERVED AND NEEDS. A SITE VISIT BY GIVING THE BASICS' PERSONNEL IS PART OF THE SCREENING PROCESS. QUALIFICATIONS FOR APPROVAL INCLUDE THAT THE RECIPIENT'S DISTRIBUTION FACILITY IS SECURE, THAT THEY DON'T SELL OR REQUIRE COMPENSATION FOR THE PRODUCTS, AND THEY CAN DOCUMENT THE NEED. ONCE APPROVED, THE ORGANIZATION SUBMITS A MONTHLY REQUEST FOR PRODUCTS BASED ON THE CURRENT MONTH'S NEED. PRODUCTS ARE DISTRIBUTED MONTHLY BASED ON THE NEED REQUESTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION 990 IS REVIEWED BY CEO AND THEN COPIES ARE PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRIOR TO THE ANNUAL MEETING, THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS ARE ASKED TO UPDATE THE CONFLICTS DISCLOSER. THE CEO REVIEWS BUSINESS RELATIONSHIPS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS A COMMITTEE SET UP TO REVIEW AND DETERMINE COMPENSATION FOR OFFICERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO MEMBERS UPON REQUEST.
